entities.Name: Anime Recommendator: Web Application
entities.Description: An application that takes in online reviews processes it and based from the user inputs will recommend certain shows that the user will likely enjoy.

entities.Name: Quiz Application
entities.Description: A project that allows the user to choose a quiz, take the quiz and be scored. This project required me to learn and apply Jquery and advanced javascript techniques.

entities.Name: Year Calculator App
entities.Description: A web application that allows you to calculate the difference from the current date to the indicated date.

entities.Name: Social Proof Section Solution
entities.Description: An early solution for a front end mentor task. This project utilized pure HTML and CSS in order to replicate the given design. This project helped in my learning towards more precise positioning of objects.

entities.Name: Youtube Clone
entities.Description: My take on a youtube clone. This project further enchanced my understanding towards responsive design and mobile first approach.

entities.Name: Anime Recommendator: Data Preparation / Processing
entities.Description: Collection, cleaning and processing of data that was used in the web application for determining the likeliness of a user to enjoy an anime based from other user reviews.

entities.Name: Mobile Application - NavigaTour
entities.Description: An application which aids the client ( Tourists ) when going to different places. Designed with Figma and Photoshop

entities.Name: Mobile Application - HeadMaster
entities.Description: An application which targets landlords and their clients. This application makes everything convenient for its users reducing the additional steps.

entities.Name: School ID Lace Design
entities.Description: The computer science course early in the year 2023 had no specific ID lace. I designed, created and sold the ID laces specifically for computer science students

entities.Name: Masquerave - Poster
entities.Description: A design which combines both a masquerade party and a common rave.

entities.Name: Classification of Pine Tree Health with Deep Learning Models (Thesis)
entities.Description: Using Tensorflow Model Zoo I configured the FRCNN and SSD model to be able to accurately classify the given pine trees.

entities.Name: A Computer Unit Reservation System
entities.Description: A server client program wherein the user (student) will be able to reserve a designated computer unit and check their reservations while the user (teacher) should be able to view the said reservations and either accept the reservation or not.

entities.Name: Gauss Jordan Elimination Calculator
entities.Description: A simple calculator that enables the user to input the number of rows and columns as well as its values. The application will then return the corresponding results.
